mixed-citation.article-title: Five new species of the land snail genus Landouria Godwin-Austen, 1918 (Gastropoda, Camaenidae) from northeastern Thailand, with note on genitalia and radula morphology of Landouria diplogramma (Möllendorff, 1902)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Finally, in order to facilitate future field research, we provide a dichotomous key for the identification of the currently known
Landouria species
in northeast Thailand .
– Shell not lustrous, peripheral keel absent, brown band absent ......................................................... 2

3. Peripheral keel slightly sharp, shell surface with numerous tiny tubercles ....
L. tuberculata
sp. nov.
– Peripheral keel very sharp, shell surface without tubercles .............................................................. 4
– Shell relatively moderate in size with high spire, shell surface without radial scaly processes ....... 5

5. Keel more sharp and distinct with its downward bent rim ...................................
L. elegans
sp. nov.

– Suture not indented, growth line obscure ...........................................................
L. circinata
sp. nov.
